# onlineFDR

`onlineFDR` allows users to control the false discovery rate (FDR) or
familywise error rate (FWER) for online hypothesis testing, where
hypotheses arrive in a stream. In this framework, a null hypothesis is
rejected based on the evidence against it and on the previous rejection
decisions.

## Installation

You can install onlineFDR from Bioconductor (release or devel) or from
GitHub:

### Bioconductor (release)

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install("onlineFDR")
```

### Bioconductor (devel)

``` r
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")

BiocManager::install(version = "devel")
BiocManager::install("onlineFDR")
```

### GitHub (development snapshot)

``` r
# install.packages("devtools") # If devtools not installed

devtools::install_github("dsrobertson/onlineFDR")
```

## Documentation

Documentation is hosted at <https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/>

To view the vignette for the version of this package installed in your
system, start R and enter:

``` r
browseVignettes("onlineFDR")
```

## References

Aharoni, E. and Rosset, S. (2014). Generalized alpha-investing:
definitions, optimality results and applications to public databases.
*Journal of the Royal Statistical Society (Series B)*, 76(4):771–794.

Foster, D. and Stine R. (2008). alpha-investing: a procedure for
sequential control of expected false discoveries. *Journal of the Royal
Statistical Society (Series B)*, 29(4):429-444.

Javanmard, A., and Montanari, A. (2015). On Online Control of False
Discovery Rate. *arXiv preprint*, <https://arxiv.org/abs/1502.06197>.

Javanmard, A., and Montanari, A. (2018). Online Rules for Control of
False Discovery Rate and False Discovery Exceedance. *Annals of
Statistics*, 46(2):526-554.

Ramdas, A., Yang, F., Wainwright M.J. and Jordan, M.I. (2017). Online
control of the false discovery rate with decaying memory. *Advances in
Neural Information Processing Systems 30*, 5650-5659.

Ramdas, A., Zrnic, T., Wainwright M.J. and Jordan, M.I. (2018). SAFFRON:
an adaptive algorithm for online control of the false discovery rate.
*Proceedings of the 35th International Conference in Machine Learning*,
80:4286-4294.

Robertson, D.S. and Wason, J.M.S. (2018). Online control of the false
discovery rate in biomedical research. *arXiv preprint*,
<https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.07292>.

Robertson, D.S., Wason, J.M.S. and Ramdas, A. (2022). Online multiple
hypothesis testing for reproducible research. *arXiv preprint*,
<https://arxiv.org/abs/2208.11418>.

Robertson, D.S., Wildenhain, J., Javanmard, A. and Karp, N.A. (2019).
onlineFDR: an R package to control the false discovery rate for growing
data repositories. *Bioinformatics*, 35:4196-4199,
<https://doi.org/10.1093/bioinformatics/btz191>.

Tian, J. and Ramdas, A. (2019). ADDIS: an adaptive discarding algorithm
for online FDR control with conservative nulls. *Advances in Neural
Information Processing Systems*, 9388-9396.

Tian, J. and Ramdas, A. (2021). Online control of the familywise error
rate. *Statistical Methods for Medical Research*, 30(4):976–993.

Zrnic, T., Jiang D., Ramdas A. and Jordan M. (2020). The Power of
Batching in Multiple Hypothesis Testing. *International Conference on
Artificial Intelligence and Statistics*, PMLR, 108:3806-3815.

Zrnic, T., Ramdas, A. and Jordan, M.I. (2021). Asynchronous Online
Testing of Multiple Hypotheses. *Journal of Machine Learning Research*,
22:1-33.

# Package index

## Fully Sequential FDR Control

- [`ADDIS()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/ADDIS.md)
  : ADDIS: Adaptive discarding algorithm for online FDR control
- [`ADDIS_exhaustive()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/ADDIS_exhaustive.md)
  : ADDIS_exhaustive: Exhaustive ADDIS procedure for online FDR control
- [`Alpha_investing()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/Alpha_investing.md)
  : Alpha-investing for online FDR control
- [`LOND()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/LOND.md)
  : LOND: Online FDR control based on number of discoveries
- [`LORD()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/LORD.md)
  : LORD: Online FDR control based on recent discovery
- [`LORDdep()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/LORDdep.md)
  : LORD (dep): Online FDR control based on recent discovery for
  dependent p-values
- [`SAFFRON()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/SAFFRON.md)
  : SAFFRON: Adaptive online FDR control

## Batch FDR Control

- [`BatchBH()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/BatchBH.md)
  : BatchBH: Online batch FDR control using the BH procedure
- [`BatchPRDS()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/BatchPRDS.md)
  : BatchPRDS: Online batch FDR control under Positive Dependence
- [`BatchStBH()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/BatchStBH.md)
  : BatchStBH: Online batch FDR control using the St-BH procedure

## Asynchronous FDR Control

- [`ADDIS()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/ADDIS.md)
  : ADDIS: Adaptive discarding algorithm for online FDR control
- [`LONDstar()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/LONDstar.md)
  : LONDstar: Asynchronous online mFDR control based on number of
  discoveries
- [`LORDstar()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/LORDstar.md)
  : LORDstar: Asynchronous online mFDR control based on recent discovery
- [`SAFFRONstar()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/SAFFRONstar.md)
  : SAFFRONstar: Adaptive online mFDR control for asynchronous testing

## False Discovery Exceedance Control

- [`supLORD()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/supLORD.md)
  : supLORD: Online control of the false discovery exceedance (FDX) and
  the FDR at stopping times

## FWER Control

- [`ADDIS_spending()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/ADDIS_spending.md)
  : ADDIS-spending: Adaptive discarding algorithm for online FWER
  control
- [`Alpha_spending()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/Alpha_spending.md)
  : Alpha-spending for online FWER control
- [`online_fallback()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/online_fallback.md)
  : Online fallback procedure for FWER control

## Other

- [`bonfInfinite()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/bonfInfinite.md)
  : Online FDR control based on a Bonferroni-like test
- [`onlineFDR-deprecated`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/onlineFDR-deprecated.md)
  : Deprecated functions in package ‘onlineFDR’
- [`onlineFDR`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/onlineFDR-package.md)
  [`onlineFDR-package`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/onlineFDR-package.md)
  : onlineFDR: A package for online error rate control
- [`StoreyBH()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/StoreyBH.md)
  : StoreyBH: Offline FDR control using the St-BH procedure
- [`setBound()`](https://dsrobertson.github.io/onlineFDR/reference/setBound.md)
  : setBound
